> That should be everything, it shouldn't go crashing on you, and it 
converted
> some test files properly (DPH's torture scen 401 makes generates 
almost 1MB
> of data).  It won't accept non-version 8 files, and non-scenario 
files
> either, so don't try feeding it those :)

1 MB of data, wow!!  I don't think anyone will create a scenario with 
half as many objects as that scenario has.  Glad to know that scenario 
has a purpose [testing converters to handle large amounts of data) 
besides boosting up a team with lots of money.

BTW, why play around with that scenario?  Is it because it has so many 
virtually identical objects?
